name: rock-raiders-web
description: Rock Raiders Web is an experiment aimed at recreating Rock Raiders PC game (1999) using browser based technologies.

scripts.patch: npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m "Bump version to $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")"
scripts.release: git checkout master && git tag $(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push --follow-tags && git checkout dev && npm run patch
